name: Hero’s Road
description:
This RPG is just like Snakes. In this world, you can recruit many partners to fight monsters, save princess and decide the kingdom’s fate.

All of partners will move with you in a line belind you, so you should be careful, don’t let your partners block your progress, lIke Snakes.

If you have blocked, don’t worry. If you saved the game in time, just load it. You need save it yourself. Don’t forget it! And, if you didn’t, you can turn to a partner, kick he/she and all of the partners behind he/she out of your team. This way will let you lose some strong partners, should be used with caution.

There are some little games in it too, eg quiz and tube. If do it well, you will get the stronger partner to fight with you.

So just enjoy it!
